name: Application Layer Protocol Exploit Mitigation Playbook
description: This playbook outlines the steps to mitigate an incident where an attacker exploited an application layer protocol to exfiltrate sensitive data from the corporate network.

action--5e89f8d6-e0d1-4e8a-b2e8-a3f0b5df.name: Block malicious outbound traffic
action--5e89f8d6-e0d1-4e8a-b2e8-a3f0b5df.description: Block traffic to the identified malicious external IP address.

action--4cad5c51-e4fc-403f-bbaf-7e94cc51.name: Set up alerting for abnormal outbound traffic patterns
action--4cad5c51-e4fc-403f-bbaf-7e94cc51.description: Configure alerts for when outbound traffic exceeds specified thresholds.

action--f21e8746-05f5-4328-b0b2-726fb8f9.name: Run detailed network scan
action--f21e8746-05f5-4328-b0b2-726fb8f9.description: Conduct a network scan to identify any remaining vulnerabilities or threats.

while-condition--8c315de5-4d90-41db-8f67.name: Scan Loop Condition
while-condition--8c315de5-4d90-41db-8f67.description: Repeat the network scan until no threats are detected.

parallel--0c3ed3bb-7336-4c7a-8730-dc5f6d.name: Post-Mitigation Tasks
parallel--0c3ed3bb-7336-4c7a-8730-dc5f6d.description: Execute follow-up actions in parallel after blocking malicious traffic.
